nodes.text: The Ploo system was a star system located in the Ploo sector of the Expansion Region. It was home to the worlds of Ploo II and Ploo IV.
Species hailing from this system included Fluggrians, Glymphids, and immigrated Quermians.

In 29 BBY, Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker pursued Norval in the Ploo system. The young man had stolen a Sith holocron and was trying to reach Ploo II, the homeworld of his mentor Murk Lundi. Kenobi boarded Norval's vessel and took the holocron after defeating the aspiring Dark Jedi in a brief lightsaber duel.
